title: Trump Orders Probe Into Epstein's Links To Bill Clinton And Other High-Profile Figures | 10 News
description: In an extraordinary move, Donald Trump has ordered officials to investigate Jeffrey Epstein's links to other high-profile figures, including Bill Clinton. Experts believe it's all part of a bid to shift the focus away from the President but say delaying the release of all the Epstein files could be making matters worse. title: Experts Warn Artificial Intelligence Will Lead To Human Extinction | 10 News+
description: Two experts on artificial intelligence have delivered a terrifying warning - that AI will lead to the extinction of humanity, possibly in our lifetime, if something isn’t done to stop its harm. The authors of the new book ‘If Anyone Builds It, Everyone Dies’ says that if AI becomes smarter than humans, it could develop its own goals, deceive its creators, and gain power over us all. They are telling governments to act quickly, to stop the development of ‘super AI’. title: Widespread Flooding Devastates Monmouth After Storm Claudia Hits Wales | 10 News
description: A major incident has been declared by authorities in Wales on Saturday after Storm Claudia triggered widespread flooding, devastating the town of Monmouth.  Video footage shows high floodwater levels inundating local homes and businesses and submerging cars on Lower High Street in Monmouth.  The flooding followed nearly 12 centimetres of rainfall in south-east Wales overnight, causing the River Monnow to rise to a record level and spill over its banks.  Natural Resources Wales issued several flood warnings for Monmouth and the surrounding areas, citing an ongoing “significant risk to life and significant disruption to the community.”  Emergency rescue crews worked to evacuate and assist residents of the town. title: Over a Dozen Injured, Two Critical After Car Crashes into Crowd at Demolition Derby Event | 10 News
description: More than a dozen people have been injured - two of them critically - after a car ploughed into the crowd at a demolition derby.  It's believed the driver blacked out before he lost control taking out a grandstand and sending fans flying. title: Coalition Reaches Joint Stance on Energy and Climate After Dumping Net Zero by 2050 | 10 News
description: The Coalition has just reached a joint position on energy and climate action.  The Liberals and Nationals met late this afternoon, after both parties dumped Net Zero by 2050.  Live to Senior Political Correspondent, Chloe Bouras, at Parliament House. title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Reports Private Security Warnings Amid Fallout With Trump | 10 News
description: The fallout is continuing after Donald Trump cut ties with Marjorie Taylor Greene, who was once one of his staunchest defenders.  The Republican congresswoman claims private security companies have contacted her with warnings for her safety. title: Pope Leo Hosts Actors & Directors At the Vatican To Celebrate Cinema | 10 News
description: Its not often celebrities are starstruck, but that's exactly what happened at The Vatican as Pope Leo rolled out the red carpet to celebrate cinema.   Australia’s very own Cate Blanchett was there, sharing a special gift with the Pontiff who issued a passionate plea about the future of film. title: Brother Of Man Behind Wheel Of NSW Derby Crash Speaks | 10 News+
description: Serious safety questions surrounding a freak accident at a demolition derby in north-west New South Wales that has left 13 people injured. Behind the wheel of the car was Steven Taylor an experienced demolition driver. 10 News+ spoke to Steven’s brother, Blake, who witnessed the whole incident. title: Rise Of Home Schooling, Pope Meets Cate Blanchett, Demi Moore & Billy Bob Talk Landman | 10 News+
description: A real-life Big Brother house is about to be called home by a group of young female influencers in South Australia. The "Tik Tok Party House" promises a summer of content creation, wild parties, and drinking games for its content creator occupants. The plan is going ahead despite the best efforts of former mayor, Simon McMahon, who spent years trying to change local laws and ban the party pad.  The COVID pandemic turned kitchen tables into classrooms across the country and since then, Australia has seen a staggering rise in families choosing to homeschool their children. One Aussie educator predicts up to half of all students could be home educated by 2050.  New Pope, Leo the 14th, has invited big-name celebrities, including Cate Blanchett and Chris Pine, to a special service in the Vatican. In light of cinemas across the world struggling to compete against streaming giants and the cost-of-living crisis, the pontiff has asked us all to go to the movies. New drilling oil drama, Landman, is returning for season 2. 10 News+ entertainment editor, Angela Bishop, sat down with its star, legends of the screen, Demi Moore and Billy Bob Thornton. title: Aussie Jack Della Maddalena Loses World Title After Dominant Win by Islam Makhachev | 10 News
description: Australia's Jack Della Maddalena has lost his welterweight world title - after falling to Russia's Islam Makhachev by unanimous decision.   Devastation for the 29-year-old who was dominated from the outset.
